titles.title: Physician Pathology Services Fair Payment Act of 2000
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to revise the payments for certain physician pathology services under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 9/19/2000--Introduced. Physician Pathology Services Fair Payment Act of 2000 - Provides for the treatment of certain physician pathology services for payments to laboratories under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.
